name: NeoBump
description:
NeoBump is a revisited arcade digital pinball with a pad ! The shape and playability of the classic pinball machine are redesigned to make it circular.  Use a force of attraction on the ball to move trajectory and have more controls !

Project made for school projet in one week.

Credits :

  • Adrien Bordes
  • Pierre Marcos
  • Théo Calvez
  • Titouan Porteau

Controls :

  • Move your pad with the mouse.
  • Use the magnet by holding space.
